text: Ki tusim kahide ho ibarahima, isama'ila ate isahaka ate yakuba ate usa di satana sabha yahudi jam isa'i si akho ki tusim zi'ada janade ho jam alaha. Ate usa tom vada ati'acari hora kauna hovega jo usa gavahi nu dupa'e jihari alaha de valom usa de pasa a'i ho'i hai ate jo kujha tusim karade hom alaha usa tom anajana nahim
